Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What is your Opinion of the Infecticon 
Fury cannon?
Note: The cannon does have restraints 
as it can not fire for one IC day and 
if it is fired before then the thing 
explodes as does the entire undersea 
base. Heh also it is going to be fired 
way far between times. Likely an OOC 
month or so before another time its 
fired if it is fired again at all. 

  o Pretty cool(so long as it isnt used to blow up one base after the other) 
  o It sucks 
  o I guess it could work if it wasn't fired at every base every single day and its on an extremely rare occasion that it is fired? 
  o Its iffy... 
  o Whee!!! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
